ActorFrame.InitCommand: %function(self) if GAMESTATE:GetEnv('Vibrate') == 'On' then self:vibrate(); end end

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_EASY) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_1) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_1) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_MEDIUM) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_1) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_1) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_HARD) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_1) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_1) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_CHALLENGE) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_1) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_1) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_MEDIUM) .. ';zoom,0.5'
@'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_HARD) .. ';zoom,0.5'
@'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_EASY) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_2) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_2) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_2) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_2) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_HARD) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_2) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_2) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_CHALLENGE) .. ';zoom,0.5'
Layer.Condition: GAMESTATE:IsHumanPlayer(PLAYER_2) and IsPlayerProfileAvailable(PLAYER_2) and not GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode()

Layer.InitCommand: @'diffuse,' .. DifficultyColor(DIFFICULTY_MEDIUM) .. ';zoom,0.5'
